item.title: By: Davox
item.dc:creator: Davox
item.description: still .. for when stuck questing, Thottbot is the best source IMHO
item.content:encoded: still .. for when stuck questing, Thottbot is the best source IMHO

item.title: By: Lonjon
item.dc:creator: Lonjon
item.description: Don't get too excited about your leet adblocking skills. Thottbot only had the site redesign up for a short time. It has now reverted to the normal, Googleish interface that we're all used to.
item.content:encoded: Don’t get too excited about your leet adblocking skills. Thottbot only had the site redesign up for a short time. It has now reverted to the normal, Googleish interface that we’re all used to.

item.title: By: Brent Michael Krupp
item.dc:creator: Brent Michael Krupp
item.description:
Hmm, doesn't look any different to me. I don't see any ads at all. Oh, right, I run Adblock Plus in Firefox and AdSubtract for IE. I never see ads.
If you see ads when you surf, you are doing something wrong.
item.content:encoded:
Hmm, doesn’t look any different to me. I don’t see any ads at all. Oh, right, I run Adblock Plus in Firefox and AdSubtract for IE. I never see ads.

If you see ads when you surf, you are doing something wrong.

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description:
god damn IGE for paying websites bandwidth charges, damn them to hell. the worst part about IGE is that i have to support them....
oh wait, nm.
item.content:encoded:
god damn IGE for paying websites bandwidth charges, damn them to hell. the worst part about IGE is that i have to support them….

item.title: By: waif
item.dc:creator: waif
item.description: The problem with wowhead is it lacks the long flaming that every weapon is in fact, a hunter weapon.
item.content:encoded: The problem with wowhead is it lacks the long flaming that every weapon is in fact, a hunter weapon.

item.title: By: Kemayo
item.dc:creator: Kemayo
item.description: I've been using <a href="http://www.wowhead.com"/ rel="nofollow">wowhead</a> lately instead of Thottbot. I like the interface more. The only downside is that it's still newish, so the comments haven't built up to the same level as Thottbot's, so occasionally I need to swing back by the ol' Thott to see if anything useful has been said about an item I want.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been using wowhead lately instead of Thottbot. I like the interface more. The only downside is that it’s still newish, so the comments haven’t built up to the same level as Thottbot’s, so occasionally I need to swing back by the ol’ Thott to see if anything useful has been said about an item I want.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Thottbot has always had its problems with reliable stats, but I don't understand the IGE shots. There's blood on its metaphorical hands? Seems they've been cautious about running any prominent gold sales ads on the front page, but maybe I missed it.
item.content:encoded: Thottbot has always had its problems with reliable stats, but I don’t understand the IGE shots. There’s blood on its metaphorical hands? Seems they’ve been cautious about running any prominent gold sales ads on the front page, but maybe I missed it.

item.title: By: tide
item.dc:creator: tide
item.description: Thottbot is also owned by IGE. And the biggest complaint I hear is that it hasn't been updated in months.
item.content:encoded: Thottbot is also owned by IGE. And the biggest complaint I hear is that it hasn’t been updated in months.

item.title: By: L'Emmerdeur
item.dc:creator: L'Emmerdeur
item.description: Free, except for the fact that it and its sister site, Allakhazam, were bought by the biggest gold farming operation on the planet, IGE.
item.content:encoded: Free, except for the fact that it and its sister site, Allakhazam, were bought by the biggest gold farming operation on the planet, IGE.
